title: Hitman Pro 3 + working patch (x86 & x64)
description:
Hitman Pro 3 is een Second Opinion Malware Scanner om je PC schoon te houden van malware (viruses, trojans, rootkits, etc.). 



Features of Hitman Pro 3:


- Recognizes and removes viruses, trojans, rootkits, spyware and other malware. 

- Revolutionary innovation in scanning technique to distinguish between malicious and safe software without signatures. 

- Short scan time - searches the system within a few minutes. 
- No extra system load. 

- Impossible to make false positives on important systems files thanks to "profiling" and white-listing. 

- Multi-vendor identification of malware in our real-time "Scan Cloud". 

- Automatically restores common system alterations made by malicious software. 

- Creates a check point in System Restore before removing malicious software. 

- Removes resistant threats using native NT boot-time deleter. 

- Removes references to malicious software (like shortcuts and registry entries). 

- Free malware scan. 

- Free online support in English, German and Dutch.



LET OP: Voer de instructties precies zo uit als staat bescreven!


Stap 1. Download en  Extract het RAR bestand met Winzip of met Winrar en Installeer de Software.

Stap 2. KopieÃƒÂ«r het bestand hitmanpro.3.7.x-patch in de map C: Program Files HitmanPro.

Stap 3. Ga naar de C: map en open de patch als administrator (rechtermuisklik, Als Administrator uitvoeren).

Stap 4. Klik op "Patch" en selecteer "HitmanPro".

Stap 5. Open Hitman Pro en het is volledig geactiveerd.



Size: 13.08 MB
Official Website: http://www.surfright.nl/en/hitmanpro/intro 
Multilingual
Windows 10 compatibel
